mn7:1.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
mn7:2.2: tamenaṃ rajako yasmiṃ yasmiṃ raṅgajāte upasaṃhareyya—yadi nīlakāya yadi pītakāya yadi lohitakāya yadi mañjiṭṭhakāya durattavaṇṇamevassa aparisuddhavaṇṇamevassa.
mn7:2.5: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, citte saṃkiliṭṭhe, duggati pāṭikaṅkhā.
mn7:2.7: tamenaṃ rajako yasmiṃ yasmiṃ raṅgajāte upasaṃhareyya—yadi nīlakāya yadi pītakāya yadi lohitakāya yadi mañjiṭṭhakāya—surattavaṇṇamevassa parisuddhavaṇṇamevassa.
mn7:2.10: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, citte asaṃkiliṭṭhe, sugati pāṭikaṅkhā.
mn7:3.2: Abhijjhāvisamalobho cittassa upakkileso, byāpādo cittassa upakkileso, kodho cittassa upakkileso, upanāho cittassa upakkileso, makkho cittassa upakkileso, paḷāso cittassa upakkileso, issā cittassa upakkileso, macchariyaṃ cittassa upakkileso, māyā cittassa upakkileso, sāṭheyyaṃ cittassa upakkileso, thambho cittassa upakkileso, sārambho cittassa upakkileso, māno cittassa upakkileso, atimāno cittassa upakkileso, mado cittassa upakkileso, pamādo cittassa upakkileso.
mn7:4.1: Sa kho so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ‘abhijjhāvisamalobho cittassa upakkileso’ti—iti viditvā abhijjhāvisamalobhaṃ cittassa upakkilesaṃ pajahati;
mn7:4.3: iti viditvā byāpādaṃ cittassa upakkilesaṃ pajahati;
mn7:4.5: iti viditvā kodhaṃ cittassa upakkilesaṃ pajahati;
mn7:4.7: iti viditvā upanāhaṃ cittassa upakkilesaṃ pajahati;
mn7:4.9: iti viditvā makkhaṃ cittassa upakkilesaṃ pajahati;
mn7:4.11: iti viditvā paḷāsaṃ cittassa upakkilesaṃ pajahati;
mn7:4.13: iti viditvā issaṃ cittassa upakkilesaṃ pajahati;
mn7:4.15: iti viditvā macchariyaṃ cittassa upakkilesaṃ pajahati;
mn7:4.17: iti viditvā māyaṃ cittassa upakkilesaṃ pajahati;
mn7:4.19: iti viditvā sāṭheyyaṃ cittassa upakkilesaṃ pajahati;
mn7:4.21: iti viditvā thambhaṃ cittassa upakkilesaṃ pajahati;
mn7:4.23: iti viditvā sārambhaṃ cittassa upakkilesaṃ pajahati;
mn7:4.25: iti viditvā mānaṃ cittassa upakkilesaṃ pajahati;
mn7:4.27: iti viditvā atimānaṃ cittassa upakkilesaṃ pajahati;
mn7:4.29: iti viditvā madaṃ cittassa upakkilesaṃ pajahati;
mn7:4.31: iti viditvā pamādaṃ cittassa upakkilesaṃ pajahati.
mn7:5.1: Yato kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ‘abhijjhāvisamalobho cittassa upakkileso’ti—
mn7:5.2: iti viditvā abhijjhāvisamalobho cittassa upakkileso pahīno hoti, ‘byāpādo cittassa upakkileso’ti—
mn7:5.3: iti viditvā byāpādo cittassa upakkileso pahīno hoti;
mn7:5.5: iti viditvā kodho cittassa upakkileso pahīno hoti;
mn7:5.7: iti viditvā upanāho cittassa upakkileso pahīno hoti;
mn7:5.9: iti viditvā makkho cittassa upakkileso pahīno hoti;
mn7:5.11: iti viditvā paḷāso cittassa upakkileso pahīno hoti;
mn7:5.13: iti viditvā issā cittassa upakkileso pahīno hoti;
mn7:5.15: iti viditvā macchariyaṃ cittassa upakkileso pahīno hoti;
mn7:5.17: iti viditvā māyā cittassa upakkileso pahīno hoti;
mn7:5.19: iti viditvā sāṭheyyaṃ cittassa upakkileso pahīno hoti;
mn7:5.21: iti viditvā thambho cittassa upakkileso pahīno hoti;
mn7:5.23: iti viditvā sārambho cittassa upakkileso pahīno hoti;
mn7:5.25: iti viditvā māno cittassa upakkileso pahīno hoti;
mn7:5.27: iti viditvā atimāno cittassa upakkileso pahīno hoti;
mn7:5.29: iti viditvā mado cittassa upakkileso pahīno hoti;
mn7:5.31: iti viditvā pamādo cittassa upakkileso pahīno hoti.
mn7:5.33: ‘itipi so bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno sugato lokavidū anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussānaṃ buddho bhagavā’ti;
mn7:6.2: ‘svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammo sandiṭṭhiko akāliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccattaṃ veditabbo viññūhī’ti;
mn7:7.2: ‘suppaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho, ujuppaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho, ñāyappaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho, sāmīcippaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho, yadidaṃ cattāri purisayugāni, aṭṭha purisapuggalā. Esa bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho āhuneyyo pāhuneyyo dakkhiṇeyyo añjalikaraṇīyo, anuttaraṃ puññakkhettaṃ lokassā’ti.
mn7:8-11.1: Yathodhi kho panassa cattaṃ hoti vantaṃ muttaṃ pahīnaṃ paṭinissaṭṭhaṃ, so ‘buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgatomhī’ti labhati atthavedaṃ, labhati dhammavedaṃ, labhati dhammūpasaṃhitaṃ pāmojjaṃ.
mn7:8-11.2: Pamuditassa pīti jāyati, pītimanassa kāyo passambhati, passaddhakāyo sukhaṃ vedeti, sukhino cittaṃ samādhiyati;
mn7:8-11.4: saṃghe aveccappasādena samannāgatomhī’ti labhati atthavedaṃ, labhati dhammavedaṃ, labhati dhammūpasaṃhitaṃ pāmojjaṃ;
mn7:8-11.5: pamuditassa pīti jāyati, pītimanassa kāyo passambhati, passaddhakāyo sukhaṃ vedeti, sukhino cittaṃ samādhiyati.
mn7:8-11.6: ‘Yathodhi kho pana me cattaṃ vantaṃ muttaṃ pahīnaṃ paṭinissaṭṭhan’ti labhati atthavedaṃ, labhati dhammavedaṃ, labhati dhammūpasaṃhitaṃ pāmojjaṃ;
mn7:8-11.7: pamuditassa pīti jāyati, pītimanassa kāyo passambhati, passaddhakāyo sukhaṃ vedeti, sukhino cittaṃ samādhiyati.
mn7:12.1: Sa kho so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṃsīlo evaṃdhammo evaṃpañño sālīnañcepi piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjati vicitakāḷakaṃ anekasūpaṃ anekabyañjanaṃ, nevassa taṃ hoti antarāyāya.
mn7:12.2: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, vatthaṃ saṅkiliṭṭhaṃ malaggahitaṃ acchodakaṃ āgamma parisuddhaṃ hoti pariyodātaṃ, ukkāmukhaṃ vā panāgamma jātarūpaṃ parisuddhaṃ hoti pariyodātaṃ;
mn7:12.3: evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṃsīlo evaṃdhammo evaṃpañño sālīnañcepi piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjati vicitakāḷakaṃ anekasūpaṃ anekabyañjanaṃ, nevassa taṃ hoti antarāyāya.
mn7:13-16.1: So mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharati, tathā dutiyaṃ, tathā tatiyaṃ, tathā catutthaṃ. Iti uddhamadho tiriyaṃ sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantaṃ lokaṃ mettāsahagatena cetasā vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena abyāpajjena pharitvā viharati;
mn7:13-16.4: upekkhāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharati, tathā dutiyaṃ, tathā tatiyaṃ, tathā catutthaṃ. Iti uddhamadho tiriyaṃ sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantaṃ lokaṃ upekkhāsahagatena cetasā vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena abyāpajjena pharitvā viharati.
mn7:17.1: So ‘atthi idaṃ, atthi hīnaṃ, atthi paṇītaṃ, atthi imassa saññāgatassa uttari nissaraṇan’ti pajānāti.
mn7:18.1: Tassa evaṃ jānato evaṃ passato kāmāsavāpi cittaṃ vimuccati, bhavāsavāpi cittaṃ vimuccati, avijjāsavāpi cittaṃ vimuccati.
mn7:18.3: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyā’ti pajānāti.
mn7:19.1: Tena kho pana samayena sundarikabhāradvājo brāhmaṇo bhagavato avidūre nisinno hoti.
mn7:19.2: Atha kho sundarikabhāradvājo brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
mn7:19.3: “gacchati pana bhavaṃ gotamo bāhukaṃ nadiṃ sināyitun”ti?
mn7:19.6: “Lokkhasammatā hi, bho gotama, bāhukā nadī bahujanassa, puññasammatā hi, bho gotama, bāhukā nadī bahujanassa, bāhukāya pana nadiyā bahujano pāpakammaṃ kataṃ pavāhetī”ti.
mn7:20.1: Atha kho bhagavā sundarikabhāradvājaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ gāthāhi ajjhabhāsi:
mn7:21.1: Evaṃ vutte, sundarikabhāradvājo brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
mn7:21.3: Seyyathāpi, bho gotama, nikkujjitaṃ vā ukkujjeyya, paṭicchannaṃ vā vivareyya, mūḷhassa vā maggaṃ ācikkheyya, andhakāre vā telapajjotaṃ dhāreyya—cakkhumanto rūpāni dakkhantīti; evamevaṃ bhotā gotamena anekapariyāyena dhammo pakāsito.
mn7:21.4: Esāhaṃ bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañca.
mn7:21.5: Labheyyāhaṃ bhoto gotamassa santike pabbajjaṃ, labheyyaṃ upasampadan”ti.
mn7:22.1: Alattha kho sundarikabhāradvājo brāhmaṇo bhagavato santike pabbajjaṃ, alattha upasampadaṃ.
mn7:22.2: Acirūpasampanno kho panāyasmā bhāradvājo eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva—yassatthāya kulaputtā sammadeva agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajanti, tadanuttaraṃ—brahmacariyapariyosānaṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihāsi.
mn7:22.3: “Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyā”ti abbhaññāsi.
mn7:22.4: Aññataro kho panāyasmā bhāradvājo arahataṃ ahosīti.
